title: My boards account
body: Ok here's what's going on my profile I'm level 30 but on my boards profile it says I'm level 4 and I really would like to comment on some of the discussions but I cant because you need to be level 6 to be able to please some help or something because its really bothering me

replies.body:
This happens because Boards and the League Client are actually two completely separate systems.  If you do not post frequently on Boards, it sometimes takes a while for Boards to get the latest info from the client on your level.  Given that you've made this post on Help and Support though, it looks like your level properly updated! ^.^

Let me know if you have any other questions!
